refnamediv.refpurpose: Simple text based interface to Go programs supporting GTP.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Simple text based interface to Go programs supporting the Go Text Protocol. It keeps track of the board and prints it after each change on the board. If a move (coordinate on the board or pass) is entered, it is played on the board for the color which is to move and a genmove command is sent to the program. Other supported commands are:

listitem.simpara: Send a genmove command for the color which is to move to the program.
Send a list_commands command to the program.
Load game from SGF file. Moves are translated into play commands for the program.
Start a new game with a given board size.
Save game to file in SGF format.
Send a undo command to the program.

refsection.para: The following commands are not allowed: black, boardsize, clear_board, genmove_black, genmove_white, white. All other commands are forwarded directly to the program as GTP commands.

listitem.para: Read command line options and arguments from file.
Log GTP stream to standard error.
